column5:
Merge pull request #112 from ahuang13/master

Version 2.0

Merge pull request #55 from edmodo/support_maven

Support to publish cropper to maven repository.

Merge pull request #54 from edmodo/update_gradle

Refactored Gradle build files and removed sdk versions from AndroidManif...
Refactored Gradle build files and removed sdk versions from AndroidManifest.xml.

Merge pull request #53 from cutmail/update-buildtools-version

Updated build tools version to 19.1.0

Merge pull request #41 from arriolac/master

Not recycling bitmap on rotate and crop.
Not recycling bitmap on rotate and crop.

Merge pull request #37 from arriolac/master

Recycling source bitmap after rotating and/or cropping.
Recycling source bitmap after rotating and cropping.

Merge pull request #36 from edmodo/update_gradle

Update Gradle settings.

Merge pull request #28 from edmodo/gradle_support

Added gradle wrapper.

Merge pull request #20 from sergeyotro/development

Fix for onRestoreInstanceState crash and update for Gradle plugin.
Fixed crash when trying to rotate image when bitmap == null.
Updated Gradle wrapper to recent version.

Merge pull request #16 from kokaz/master

Integration of Gradle and removed a png that caused a compilation error

Integration of Gradle and removed a png that caused a compilation error

* Integration with the new Gradle-based android build system as well as the Android Studio IDE
* CropperSample/res/drawable-xhdpi/cheetahs.png is not considered as a png file by aapt

Merge pull request #14 from lidemin/master

Added a setImageBitmap function with EXIF information as parameter

Merge pull request #11 from edmodo/use_empty_rect

Use EMPTY_RECT constant.

Merge pull request #10 from edmodo/performance_refactor

Performance optimization during draw cycle.

Merge pull request #9 from edmodo/getActualCropRect

Added getActualCropRect() API

Performance optimization during draw cycle.

Use a constant empty Rect instance instead of instantiating a new one every draw cycle.
Renamed getPointContainer() to getActualCropRect() and have it return a RectF.

Merge pull request #7 from sergeyotro/master

Fix for blank view when bitmap was added after view creation
Added PointContainer for receiving x/y points and not the cropped bitmap.
Fix for empty view in case when image wasn't set in XML.
Fixed Android Support library for Cropper.

Merge pull request #5 from edmodo/Cropper_Changes_CropperSampleApp2

Rotation functionality added.
Add the large value size as well.

Merge pull request #4 from edmodo/Cropper_Changes_CropperSampleApp2

Made Crop button look more like button. Shifted layouts.
Redesign of the Cropper app to clean it up.
Made Crop button look more like button. Shifted layouts.

Merge pull request #3 from edmodo/Cropper_Changes_CropperSampleApp2

Cropper changes cropper sample app2

Merge pull request #2 from edmodo/Cropper_Changes_CropperSampleApp

Changed SDK version. Added ToggleButton.
Disables spinners based on fixedAspectRatio. ShowGuidelines is a spinner.

Merge pull request #1 from edmodo/CropperChanges_Methods

Cropper changes methods
Removed setAspectRatioX, Y. Set fixedAspectRatio to false.
Cropper and Cropper Sample, with Libraries added.
